name: Money Garden (itch)
description:
You have a tree in your garden a MONEYTREE! Strap your lawn vacuum on you back and collect all the money it drops. Try to keep your garden clean.

  • Upgrades
  • Robots (makes it possible to idle)

Left mouse button or Right bumber (Controller) to start/stop vacuum cleaner.

Follow me on twitter @mrhankey91 or go to my website for more games https//xtasestudios.com 

If you like the game please consider donating. Donating will help me to get it to Steam. Enjoy!!
